Banner.Description: I am a **Backend-Focused Full-Stack Developer** dedicated to building high-availability enterprise systems. I specialize in architecting scalable solutions with .NET, NestJS, and Node.js, transforming complex business requirements into high-performance digital reality.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I don't just write code; I build scalable digital infrastructure. My journey is defined by a commitment to engineering excellence, focusing on system reliability, data integrity, and performance optimization.

With a deep background in **Enterprise ERP systems**, I specialize in modernizing legacy workflows and architecting secure APIs that handle millions of records. I focus on standardizing design patterns to ensure long-term maintainability and system stability.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Front-end Developer | Full-stack web developer
Description: Led end-to-end development of high-volume enterprise systems (TMS), successfully supporting 5M+ regional users.
Architected core backend services using ASP.NET Core,NestJS ensuring high availability through optimized database schema design and MSSQL tuning.
Engineered complex business modules, including vehicle valuation algorithms and legal compliance engines (Court Bans).
Modernized manual government workflows into digital systems, reducing processing times from days to minutes.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to translate regional regulations into secure, scalable technical solutions.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Developer
Description: Developed and optimized web applications within an Agile environment, contributing to both frontend and backend modules.
Streamlined system performance through targeted API optimizations and efficient frontend state management.
Gathered and documented technical requirements for major system upgrades, leading to measurable reductions in system downtime.
Collaborated with senior engineers to implement modern design patterns, improving overall application responsiveness.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Transport Management System (TMS)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A mission-critical ERP built from scratch to digitize regional transport administration. As Lead Developer, I architected the Vehicle Lifecycle Module, handling complex legal workflows like Court Bans, Ownership Transfers, and Tax Valuation algorithms. I led the migration of millions of legacy records into a secure MSSQL schema, ensuring transactional consistency and reducing processing times from days to minutes.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Addis Ababa Tourism Digital Platform
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A high-performance tourism portal designed to showcase Addis Ababa to a global audience. I implemented a Headless CMS architecture to decouple content management from the frontend. Using Next.js and Static Site Generation (SSG), I achieved sub-second load times and high SEO rankings. The system empowers non-technical staff to manage dynamic events, destination guides, and weekly newsletters via an intuitive Strapi dashboard.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: If you're interested in discussing new opportunities, please feel free to reach out. I'll be delighted to receive your contact, and I'll respond promptly upon seeing your message.
